text:
There will be no water supply between 9.45 a.m. and 4 p.m. on Tuesday in the following areas because of monthly maintenance at pumping station at Kambarasampettai by the Tangedoco officials. They are Marakkadai, Viragupettai, Malaikottai, Chinthamani, Thillai Nagar, Anna Nagar, Puthur, Khajapettai, Cantonment, Junction, Uyyakondan Thirumalai, South Ramalinga Nagar, Alpha Nagar, Fathima Nagar, Pirattiyur, Edamalaipattipudur, Viswas Nagar, Jaya Nagar and Cauvery Nagar.

In a statement, corporation commissioner M. Vijayalakshmi said water supply would be resumed on Wednesday.
title: No water supply today
